In recent years, the traditional term has begun to be used more locally, and semi-official organizations have hosted some events, such as the Canton Cultural Festival, which translates to the Canton Festival. Some event organizers use the word "Canton" to refer to Guangdong, such as "Art Canton" and "Canton Asian Music Festival". The non-governmental organization Guangzhou Fan League uses Canton FC as the English name of Guangzhou Evergrande Football Club, which is supported by Qudi. Some committee members suggested naming the Canton Tower as Uranium Canton Tower, so as to make full use of the internationally renowned brand of Uranium Canton and unify the city logo, and the English name of the Canton Tower is Uranium Canton Tower, which is the first time that the authorities have used Canton back since 1979. Although the Canton Tower is owned by the government, it is not a government department, so there is some space in the English naming, and it will not be subject to some mainland regulations.
tgt: 呢幾年，傳統稱謂開始多返地方用，半官方機構主辦啲活動，如廣府文化節，就翻譯成“Canton Festival”。有啲活動舉辦方就用“Canton”來表示廣東，好似藝術廣東國際收藏品及藝術品博覽會嘅英文名係“Art Canton”，廣東亞洲音樂節英文名係“Canton Asian Music Festival”。民間團體廣州球迷聯盟係用Canton FC，作為渠地支持嘅廣州恒大足球俱樂部嘅英文名。有委員建議咗將廣州塔命名成“Canton Tower”，以充分利用“Canton”呢個國際知名品牌，統一城市標識，最尾廣州塔英文定名係“Canton Tower”，呢個係1979年以來當局首次用返Canton。雖然廣州塔係政府所有，不過唔係政府單位部門，所以英文命名度有返啲空間，唔會畀啲大陸法規約束。

src: "The Victory of the Democratic Society" is a Hong Kong social movement song born in 2012, composed by Anthony Kwong, lyrics by Barry, and sung by the band VIIV. The content is probably as follows: The pan-democrats have passively faced the rulers in the past, and after the leader of the democratic movement, Situ Hua, nailed the cover, the pan-democrats need to let the new generation inherit the democratic movement. The song was sung several times in 2012 at the 2012 Movement Against Moral and National Education and the 20th anniversary of the Tiananmen Massacre. It continued to be sung in the 2014 school strike in Hong Kong and the peaceful Occupy Central and umbrella movements.
tgt: 《民主會戰勝歸來》係一首誕生於2012年嘅香港社運歌曲，由Anthony Kwong作曲，Barry作詞，VIIV樂隊演唱。內容大概係：泛民主派喺過去消極咁面對統治者，喺民主運動嘅領導者司徒華釘咗蓋之後，泛民主派更需要令新世代承接民主運動。呢首歌曾喺2012年嘅反對德育及國民教育科運動同埋六四事件二十三週年集會入面多次唱響。喺2014年香港學界大罷課同和平佔中、雨傘運動入面繼續傳唱。

Because Guo Taiming was born in Banqiao Cihui Palace and lived in the wing room of the palace for nine years, he recognized himself as blessed by Mazu. Guo Taiming also firmly believes in Guan Shengdi Jun (Guan Dijun, Guan Di, Guan Gong), and worships the statue of Emperor Guan in the Tucheng headquarters of Hon Hai, and personally went to the Guandi Temple in Jiezhou, Shanxi Province to welcome the statue of Emperor Guan's soft body to Taiwan. Guo Taiming once encountered Hu Zongxian's bomb case, but the explosive materials were not ignited, and there was a false alarm. Guo Taiming said that the bomb did not explode, and it was the Guan Sheng Emperor who showed his spirit. During the 2014 Sunflower Student Movement, Guo Taiming claimed to have been instructed by Guan Gong to coordinate the exit of the student movement. On April 17, 2019, Guo Taiming went to Banqiao Cihui Palace and Tamsui Wusheng Palace to pay homage and ask whether he wanted to participate in the 2020 presidential election of The President of the Republic of China; Guo Taiming said that Mazu had a dream a few days ago to make him come out to do good deeds for the suffering people and bring peace and prosperity to Taiwan, and he will definitely follow Mazu's instructions.
tgt: 郭臺銘因出生喺板橋慈惠宮，並喺宮內的廂房住咗九年，自認得到媽祖嘅庇佑。郭臺銘都篤信關聖帝君（關帝君、關帝、關公），喺鴻海嘅土城總部內都奉祀關帝神像，曾親自前往山西解州關帝廟迎接關帝軟身神像來臺。郭臺銘曾遭遇胡宗賢炸彈案，不過爆燃物未引燃，虛驚一場。郭臺銘稱炸彈未爆炸係關聖帝君顯神靈。2014年太陽花學運期間，郭臺銘自稱奉關公顯靈指示，協調學運退場。2019年4月17日，郭臺銘到板橋慈惠宮同淡水武聖宮參拜、請示神意，係唔係要參加2020年中華民國總統選舉；郭臺銘表示，媽祖前幾天有託夢，要佢出來為受苦受難嘅老百姓做好事，帶給臺灣和平繁榮，他一定會遵照媽祖指示。

For example, Ukraine band Teleri released the song "Hello Putin!" on May 6, 2014, and the song uses double offences to replace "khuylo" with "Hello" in English to say "Putin's head", and in the chorus section, the band members wear jerseys to mingle with fans and shout "Hello Putin". There is a Cantonese nursery rhyme saying "When it rains heavily, the streets are flooded...... flooding", reflecting the problem of flooding in Guangzhou since ancient times. On June 12-13, 2008, the heavy rain · 13 June in Shenzhen caused a large-scale flood in the urban area of Shenzhen, with more than 1,000 flooding points and 6 deaths. On May 7, 2010, Guangzhou was hit by a rare rainstorm, almost the entire city was soaked in the sun, killing six people and damaging 18,000 cars. Soon after, heavy rains on the 9th and 14th followed, causing flooding of varying severity. In the aftermath of the flooding, China's central government has noticed how serious the problem of urban flooding is. On July 21, 2012, a heavy rainstorm hit Beijing, killing 79 people and causing economic losses of 11.64 billion yuan.
tgt: 廣東話童謠有句「落雨大，水浸街……」，反映出廣州城自古就有水浸嘅問題。 2008年6月12-13號，深圳6·13特大暴雨導致深圳城區大面積水浸，水浸點有1000幾個咁多，死咗6個人。2010年5月7號，廣州市俾罕見暴雨襲擊，幾乎全城俾浸曬，死咗6個人，浸壞咗成1.8萬部汽車。跟住好快，9日、14號嘅暴雨又接踵而至，造成唔同程度水浸。呢次水浸後，中國中央政府先注意到城市水浸問題嘅有幾嚴重。2012年7月21號，一場特大暴雨襲擊北京市，死咗79人，經濟損失116.4億文人民幣。

src: In the Tang Dynasty, "" began to replace "slang", and in the Song Dynasty, "slang" was completely replaced by "". At the same time, he pointed out that the common "slang" in the history books of the Tang Dynasty was also written as "Li Bureaucracy" in the Song Dynasty, indicating the performance and origin of the concepts of "slang" and "Li", and "Li" is the direct successor name of "slang", but "Li" has already spawned a branch of slang people who are specifically referring to the development of the south, and they take the south as the center of their activities, which is the Li nationality today. Most of the slang people who remained in Maoming in western Guangdong have integrated into the Han nationality and become part of the Han nationality, while the other group of slang people who remained in Dianyong in Guangxi Province have integrated into and become part of some ethnic groups, such as the Zhuang and Buyi peoples.
tgt: 至唐代，「黎」開始替代「俚」，到宋代「俚」嘅族稱完全俾「黎」取代嗮。顧炎武喺《天下郡國利病書》引《南裔異物誌》指出： 「俚在廣州之南，俗呼俚為黎」，同時提出喺唐代史書中常見嘅「俚僚」，之喺宋代又寫作「黎僚」，表明出「俚」、「黎」概念之間嘅演變同傳承，「黎」即係「俚」嘅直接繼承名，但係「黎」已經演變成特指向南發展嘅俚人嘅一支、佢哋以海南為活動中心，也即係今日嘅黎族。留喺粵西茂名啲埞嘅俚人多數已經融入唨漢族，成為唨漢族嘅一部分；而另一支留喺廣西啲埞嘅俚人融入同埋變唨僚人，成為唨壯族、布依族等等啲民族嘅一部分。

Generally speaking, clear or full clear refers to the clear fricative or unaspirated clear plosive in modern phonetics, if the two terms are used together, the anterior fricative, the posterior plosive, and the voiced or voiced fricative, if the two together, the anterior fricative, the posterior plosive. Voiced or voiced refers to nasal and flowing voices. In the first column from the right of the belly, tongue, teeth, and teeth in the "Rhyme Mirror", the superscript "clear" is an unaspirated stopper, that is, completely clear. In the third column from the right, the superscript "voiced" is voiced stop, that is, voiced. The first column of the right genus of the guttural bar is polyphonic – which can also be understood as a guttural stop. The other columns with the single "clear" or "voiced" characters are fricatives in the same part of the column. The phonemes of the "voiced" counterpoint of the guttural sound are Yu 3 and Yu 4 of the Middle Initials, and the actual sound value is controversial. The right and left sides of the "tongue teeth" correspond to the "half tongue" and "half teeth" in the 36 letters, respectively.
tgt: 韻圖中嘅清濁是就發音方法而論嘅。傳統音韻學喺呢方面嘅術語係有啲含混不清嘅。一般來講清或全清指現代語音學中的清擦音或不送氣清塞音，若兩種術語並舉，則前指擦音，後指塞音； 濁或全濁指濁擦音或濁塞音，若兩者並舉則前指擦音，後指塞音。清濁或次濁指鼻音、流音。喺《韻鏡》裏邊脣、舌、牙、齒音嘅右數第一列，上標「清」者爲不送氣塞音，即全清。右數第三列，上標「濁」者爲濁塞音，即全濁。喉音欄右屬首列係零聲母——都可以理解成喉塞音。其他單標「清」或「濁」字嘅列都喺所在欄相同部位嘅擦音。喉音嘅「清濁」對映嘅音位係中古聲母的喻三和喻四，實際音值如何，有爭議。「舌音齒」嘅右、左分別對映三十六字母中的「半舌」、「半齒」。

Cantonese Braille, or Cantonese Braille, is a system that uses Braille to spell Cantonese Chinese. The Chinese Braille commonly used in Hong Kong and Macau refers to this system. As a half-syllable script, Cantonese Braille is usually composed of three squares, each representing initials, finals and tones, and these three elements form a pronunciation, that is, a character is composed of three braille cells. However, the first and seventh tones of the nine tones of Cantonese will not be phonetized, so the words of the first and seven tones only need two squares to represent. In addition, if you encounter a situation of "zero initials", you should add a space after the finals for identification.
tgt: 粵語點字，或者叫粵語凸字，係一種用點字嚟到拼寫粵語中文嘅系統。香港同澳門常用嘅中文點字就係指呢個系統。作為半音節文字，粵語點字通常由三個方塊組成，每個方塊分別代表聲母、韻母及聲調，並且由呢三個元素去組成一個發音，即係話用三格點字嚟組成一個字。但係粵音九聲第一、七聲唔會標音，所以第一，七聲嘅單字只需要二個方塊就可以表示。另外，如果遇到「零聲母」的情況，就要在韻母後面加入一架空格，以作辨識。

The Four Brahmanas, also known as the Four Brahmanas, is a Buddhist term for the practice of the four states of mind: compassion, compassion, joy and renunciation. Derived from ancient India Brahmanism, later adopted than Buddhism. Buddhist practitioners want to expand the four states of mind to the boundless, so they are also called the four immeasurable minds and the four immeasurable views.

Netherlands (formerly United Kingdom) composer Henry Litolff (English: Henry Litolff) composed a song "Concerto Symphonique No.3", in which the fourth movement, Furioso, begins with the rapid piano and pipe guitar competition, leading to the wind rendition to play the majestic melody of the school song, and then the piano uses variations to play this melody for about seven and a half hours. The author escaped from a United Kingdom prison and was sheltered by the Netherlands, so he gratefully embeds the Netherlands national anthem in this section, which is the only music in history that can obtain the full melody of the school song.
tgt: 荷蘭（原英國）作曲家Henry Litolff（英文：Henry Litolff）作咗一首《Concerto Symphonique No.3》，其中第四樂章Furioso開始由急促鋼琴同管絃樂競美下，引出管絃樂奏出雄壯培正校歌嘅旋律，隨後鋼琴用變奏方式將呢個旋律發揮落去，全長約七分半鐘。作者從英國監獄逃咗出來，得到荷蘭庇護，所以就感激咁將荷蘭國歌嵌入呢段樂段，算係目前史上能獲得有關校歌完整旋律嘅唯一音樂。

src: University shoe store, also known as university shoe company, is a veteran footwear business in Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, the founder is Li Juguan, was originally an apprentice of Huaqiang shoe store on Gaodi Street, Qu founded a shoe store in 1934, the original name of the shoes store, the shop is located in Wanfu Road, because of the high quality of materials, suitable and durable, clear real price, its products to customers known as iron shoes. After 1941, it was renamed as a university shoe store, and the shop was moved to No. 333 and No. 335 Huiai East Road (No. 351~353, Zhongshan 4th Road, after the Republic of China). After the relocation, Li Juguan carefully designed a unique style of student shoes and instructor shoes two kinds of leather shoes, deeply loved by the military, political and academic circles, famous, Li Juguan in the 40s ~ 60s is also known as Guangzhou's "shoe doctor".

There is a theory called the Gettier problem, which refutes the Gettier problem. It states that even if the above three conditions are met, it is still not possible to say "S knows P" in some cases. In response to this situation, Robert · Nozick proposed uranium truth tracking uranium, arguing that as long as the significance of the investigation is reasonably explained, the rebuttal of Gettier can be resolved. He retains the first two conditions of the original JTB theory, and then changes the third "confirmation" condition to "If P is not true, S does not believe P, and if P is true, S believes P".
tgt: 有一套理論為葛梯爾問題，呢個問題反駁咗葛梯爾問題。當中提出咗上述三個條件就算得到滿足，喺某啲情況下仍然唔可以講“S知道P”。對於呢個情況，羅伯特·諾齊克提出咗“真理追蹤”，認為只要合理解釋“確證”嘅意義，就能夠化解葛梯爾嘅反駁。佢保留原先JTB理論入面嘅前面兩個條件，然後將第三個“確證”條件改成“如果P唔係真，S就唔相信P；如果P係真，S就相信P”。

The idea of a time order protection agency may come from some science fiction works such as the time police, such as Pol · Anderson's "Time Patrol" series of stories, Asimov's novel "The End of Eternity", and the TV series "Chrono Wonder Man". After Hawking's paper was published, Paul · wrote the novel "The Temporal Preservation Incident", in which he had a worldview in which the universe would kill him if any scientist came to do any kind of time travel.
tgt: 時序保護機構嘅諗法可能來源於一啲科幻作品中時間警察之類嘅機構，譬如波爾·安德森嘅《時間巡邏》系列故事、阿西莫夫嘅小說《永恆的終結》、電視劇《超時空奇俠》。霍金篇論文發表之後，保羅·萊文森（Paul Levinson）寫咗小說《時序保護事件》，佢嘅世界觀裏便，如果有邊個科學家就嚟搞出任何形式嘅時間旅行，宇宙就會殺咗佢。

In 1998, the world's first cat café, "Cat Garden", officially opened in Taipei, Taiwan. This novel theme has attracted many customers who love cats, and even from Japan and other foreign countries. Later, the emerging concept of cat cafes spread to Japan. In 2004, Japan's first cat café, Cat's Time, opened in Osaka. The popularity of the cat café is becoming more and more known, and it is popular with many customers. Due to the small size and large population of Japan, many Japanese live in apartments, and the space is very limited, so it is not convenient to keep pets. The concept of a cat café has become a place for many young people who love cats, and can relieve work stress and entertainment. In 2005, Tokyo's first cat café, Cat no Shop ( Japanese : ) opened, and the cat café industry in Japan has grown rapidly. Between 2005 and 2010, 79 cat cafes were opened across the country in Japan.

Since the beginning of the Han Dynasty, the term "Taixue" has become the official name of the central government in the Jingshi Xue Palace. Taixue is the national culture after the Han Dynasty, and unlike the previous national studies, he established Confucianism as an orthodox study. The Western Han Dynasty set up Taixue in Chang'an (today's Xi'an), the Eastern Han Dynasty and the Western Jin Dynasty set up Taixue in Luoyang, and the Eastern Jin Dynasty set up Taixue in Jiankang (now Nanjing). In the Jin Dynasty, another Guozixue was set up for the children of the ministers and doctors to learn, which was separated from Taixue, and the Guozi sacrificial wine system was in charge of Guozixue and Taixue. After the Northern and Southern Dynasties, the Sui Dynasty was changed to the Guozi Belt, and after the end of the Qing Dynasty, the imperial examination system was abolished, and the Guozi Belt was also canceled.
tgt: 漢代開始「太學」呢個名詞成為咗中央喺京師學宮嘅正式名稱。太學係漢代之後嘅國學，同之前嘅國學唔同嘅係，佢確立咗儒學做正統學問。西漢就喺長安（今日嘅西安）設立太學，東漢、西晉就喺洛陽設立太學，東晉就喺建康（今南京）設立太學。喺晉代嗰陣，另外設立咗專畀公卿同大夫子弟學習嘅國子學，呢個就同太學分開，國子祭酒係統一掌領國子學同太學。南北朝之後，隋代就改做國子監，清末之後就廢除科舉制度，國子監亦都跟住取消。

src: When they arrived at the Three Kingdoms Array, a little force of Wu slowly entered Lingnan here. In 217, Panyu changed the governance of Jiaozhou. In 246, the state of Wu split Jiaozhou into two systems, "Jiaozhou" and "Guangzhou", south of Hepu is "Jiaozhou", and north of Hepu is "Guangzhou". The Guangzhou administration is placed in Panyu. This is the origin of the name "Guangzhou". The founding formation of Guangzhou has a large area, including the four counties of Nanhai, Cangwu, Yulin and Hepu. In 1921, the city hall was established in the city of Guangzhou, and the city of Guangdong Province (Guangzhou Prefecture) was renamed "Guangzhou City", and Guangzhou became the first organized city of the Republic of China and was a model city of the Republic of China. Nowadays, Cantonese people still call Guangzhou the provincial capital or Panyu. The Old Bottom South China Sea was also under the jurisdiction of Guangzhou, and is now under the administration of Foshan City.
tgt: 到咗三國陣，吳國啲勢力慢慢埋到來嶺南呢度。喺217年番禺變咗做交州嘅治所。到246年吳國拆開交州成「交州」同「廣州」兩個建制，合浦以南就係「交州」，合浦以北就係「廣州」。廣州治所放喺番禺度。呢個就係「廣州」個名嘅起源。創始陣廣州統轄啲地方好大，包咗南海、蒼梧、鬱林、合浦四郡。1921年陣廣州城度搞起市政廳，廣東省城（廣州府）就改咗名成「廣州市」，廣州市做咗中華民國第一個建制市，係民國嘅模範市。民國呢陣時，廣東人仲嗌廣州做省城或者番禺。舊底南海亦由廣州管轄，宜家就畀咗佛山市打理。

src: In 1915, Zhang Huichang and Yang Xianyi were sent to Lin Sen to learn flying skills at the Air Force School established in United States, and later Zhang Huichang transferred to the United States Curtis Aviation School to study. He returned to China in 1917 and served as an adjutant of the Generalissimo Sun Yat-sen's palace. In 1918, he served as the deputy director of the Aviation Department of the Generalissimo's Office, and once cooperated with the army to defeat Long Jiguang. In 1920, he served as the captain of the first team of the Guangdong Army Aircraft Fleet. In 1922, he served as deputy director of the Guangzhou Aviation Bureau, captain of the first team, and acting director. After the reorganization of the Chinese Kuomintang, he went to study in the Soviet Union. After returning to China in 1928, he served as the first principal of the aviation school. In June 1928, he was appointed Commander of Aviation. He also served as the director of the Aviation Division of the General Headquarters of the Eighth Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army. On November 11, 1928, the Guangzhou land aircraft with Zhang Huichang as the captain took off from Guangzhou Dashatou Airport and finally arrived in Nanjing through 12 provinces, marking a milestone in the history of Chinese aviation. On August 24, 1929, he was appointed Director of the Aviation Department of the Ministry of Military Affairs. On September 10, 1929, he was appointed Vice Chairman of China Airlines.
tgt: 1915年，張惠長同楊仙逸一齊被送往林森奉命喺美國成立嘅空軍學校學習飛行技術，後來張惠長又轉入美國寇蒂斯航空學校學習。1917年回國，任孫中山大元帥府侍從副官。1918年，任大元帥府航空處副處長，曾揸飛機協同陸軍討伐龍濟光。1920年，任粵軍飛機隊第一隊隊長。1922年，任廣州航空局副局長、第一隊隊長、代局長。中國國民黨改組後，佢去蘇聯學習。1928年回國後任航空學校首任校長。1928年6月，任航空司令。仲做過國民革命軍第八路軍總指揮部航空處處長。1928年11月11號，以張惠長為機長嘅「廣州」號陸上飛機從廣州大沙頭機場起飛，經十二個省最後抵達南京，成為中國航空史上里程碑。1929年8月24號，出任軍政部航空署署長。1929年9月10號，出任中國航空公司副理事長。

src: Fox Hunt 2014 is an operation deployed by the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China to hunt down corrupt CCP officials who have fled abroad (including Hong Kong and Macau). Fox hunting literally interprets uranium to arrest fox uranium, and compares the corrupt officials of the CCP to foxes. Xinhua reported that the operation began on July 22, 2014, and ended at the end of the year, but there was other evidence that by August 2015, Operation Fox Hunt had not only not been completed, but had also extended to other countries; the incident had attracted the attention of the United States government, and a statement was issued that Chinese officials must notify the United States before enforcing the law across United States borders.
tgt: 獵狐2014專項行動（簡稱獵狐2014 ）係由中華人民共和國公安部部署執行嘅追捕逃亡到境外（包括香港、澳門）嘅中共貪官嘅行動。 獵狐從字面解做“逮捕狐狸”，將中共貪官比喻做狐狸。新華社報道呢個行動自2014年7月22日起到年底結束， 但亦有其他證據表明：去到2015年8月，獵狐行動不單止未完，仲延伸到其他國家；事件引起美國政府關注，而且發表聲明，指中國官員喺美國跨境執法前，必須事先知會美國。

src: Taiwan Line 13 is a provincial highway of the Republic of China (Taiwan). The north side starts from Neihu in Xiangshan District, Hsinchu City, passes through Jianshanxia, Touwu Township, Miaoli City, Tongluo Township, Sanyi Township, Houli District of Taichung City, and ends at Fengyuan District, with a total length of 69.241 kilometers. Among them, the section from Jianshan to Fengyuan is a necessary road from northern Taiwan to Miaoli County and Taichung City, commonly known as "Jianfeng Highway". More than seventy percent of this route is in Miaoli County, and there are many well-known scenic spots along the way, which is one of the most important highways in Miaoli County. Taiwan Line 13 has another branch line.
tgt: 臺13線，係中華民國（臺灣）一條省道。北邊由新竹市香山區內湖開始，經苗栗縣頭份市尖山下、頭屋鄉、苗栗市、銅鑼鄉、三義鄉、臺中市后里區，至終點豐原區，全長69.241公里。其中尖山至豐原路段係臺灣北部地區去苗栗縣、臺中市山線地區必經要道，俗稱「尖豐公路」。呢條路線七成以上路段喺苗栗縣境內，沿途有好多知名風景名勝，係苗栗縣最重要公路之一。臺13線另有1條支線。

src: In 2018, Angelina left Palette Media to join her current agency, Prism Entertainment. Palette Media accused him of fraud and filed a lawsuit against Angelina with the Seoul High Prosecutor's Office, alleging that she failed to fulfill her contractual obligations and signed an agency contract with another agency, Prism Entertainment, without the consent of Palette Media. Palette Media claims that the company signed an exclusive three-year (2016-2019) contract with Angelina. A few years ago, Angelina rose to fame on social media and became the "hottest Korea pop fan." Palette Media alleges that she participated in for-profit promotional activities and received commercial sponsorships on several occasions without the agency's permission. Separately, the agency said it had filed a lawsuit against Angelina for damages for "illegal business activities."
tgt: 2018年， 安吉麗娜離開了調色闆傳媒， 加入咗佢而家嘅經紀公司稜鏡娛樂。調色闆傳媒指控佢欺詐， 並向首爾高級檢察官辦公室提起對安吉麗娜嘅訴訟， 指控她未能履行合同義務， 並冇得到調色闆傳緊媒同意的情況下， 與另一家代理公司稜鏡娛樂簽訂了經紀合同。調色闆傳媒聲稱， 該公司與安吉麗娜簽訂了份為期三年 (2016-2019年) 嘅獨家合同。幾年前， 安吉麗娜在社交媒體上一舉成名， 成為 "最熱門的韓國流行樂迷"。palette media 聲稱， 她參加了盈利性質的宣傳活動， 並喺未經該機構許可嘅情況下多次獲得商業贊助。另外， 該機構表示已經就安吉麗娜從事嘅 "非法商業活動" 對佢提起損害賠償訴訟。

src: In the last years of Kangxi, after the Qing court entered Tibet to expel the Dzungar invasion, the secular political affairs of Tibet were in charge of several people appointed by the Qing court. After the Albuba Rebellion was pacified during the Yongzheng period, the government affairs of Tibet, which was ordered by the Qing court, were restricted by the minister stationed in Tibet. During his time in power, the authorities described him as "loyal and honest", and he was trusted by the imperial court. In the fourth year of Qianlong (1739), because of his meritorious efforts in recruiting and pacifying the armistice of the three tribes of Baleb (now the Kathmandu Valley in Nepal), Po Luo Nai was made the king of Doro County, becoming the most powerful Tibetan prince in the Qing Dynasty. In the twelfth year of Qianlong (1747), Po Luo Nai died of illness, and the imperial court appointed his second child, Zhurmat Namzal, to inherit the prince of the county, and at the same time take care of the affairs of Lun. Zhurmat Namzale "never believed in the Dalai Lama and harbored a grudge", ostensibly obeying the minister stationed in Tibet, but secretly contacted the Dzungar Ministry of Mongolia and waited for the opportunity to send troops to rebel. In the 14th year of Qianlong (1749), Zhurmat Namzal killed his eldest brother Zhurmat Tsebuden and took control of Ali. In the fifteenth year of Qianlong (1750), Fu Qing and Labdun, the ministers stationed in Tibet, booby-trapped Zhurmat Namzal because of the situation, and Zhuo Nar (official name) of the same faction as him killed the two ministers stationed in Tibet. Then the Qing court sent the governor of Sichuan, Celeng, to lead troops into Tibet to quell the rebellion.
tgt: 康熙末年清廷入到西藏驅逐準噶爾入侵之後，西藏世俗政事由清廷任命嘅幾位噶倫負責。雍正年間阿爾布巴之亂平定之後，清廷命令噶倫頗羅鼐總理西藏嘅政務，受到駐藏大臣制約。喺頗羅鼐執政期間，當局形容佢嘅表現係「克盡忠誠，實心效力」，得到朝廷信任。到乾隆四年（1739年），因為招攬、撫平巴勒布三部（依家尼泊爾加德滿都谷地嗰邊）停戰有功，頗羅鼐晉封多羅郡王，成為清代權勢最大嘅西藏王公。乾隆十二年（1747年）頗羅鼐病死，朝廷封佢第二個仔珠爾默特那木札勒繼承郡王爵，同時兼顧噶倫事務。珠爾默特那木札勒「素不信奉達賴喇嘛，心懷仇隟」，表面上服從駐藏大臣，但暗中聯絡蒙古準噶爾部，等機會出兵反叛。乾隆十四年（1749年），珠爾默特那木札勒殺死佢大哥珠爾默特策布登，控制住阿里。乾隆十五年（1750年），駐藏大臣傅清、拉布敦因為形勢，誘殺珠爾默特那木札勒，同佢同一派嘅卓呢爾（官名）羅卜藏札什就殺咗嗰兩個駐藏大臣。跟住清廷就派四川總督策楞帶兵入藏平息叛變。

The reunion of separated families between the North and the South (남북이산가족상봉) is an event jointly organized by the governments of South and North Korea to reunite families scattered in two countries. The first event was held in 1985 and was not held until 2000. By April 2018, a total of 20 reunions of separated families from the north and south had been held, with more than 22,000 people participating. Because of the volatile relationship between the two countries, the reunion of separated families between the North and the South is seen as an indicator of relations on the Korean Peninsula.
tgt: 南北離散家族重聚（남북이산가족상봉）係一項由南韓、北韓政府聯手舉辦嘅活動，俾分散喺兩國嘅屋企重逢。第一次活動喺1985年舉行，之後到2000年先再搞。到到2018年4月，南北離散家族重聚活動總共搞咗20次，超過2.2萬人參加。由於兩國關係多變，所以南北離散家族重聚能否進行，被視為朝鮮半島關係嘅指標。

In March 2020, the major political parties launched their own internal party procedures, and the prospective candidates in each district also began to explore the way out. At this time, Tai Yiu-ting and Au Nok-hin jointly advocated a coordination mechanism that includes "citizen participation", with the goal of reducing the number of voters, and said that they hoped to promote a consensus on "abstaining from election" in order to win the most seats. On March 10, Tai wrote an article in Hong Kong's Apple Daily, proposing a two-stage coordination and civic engagement, with the ultimate goal of minimising the number of lists to participate in official elections, and getting as close to the district's target number of seats as possible. After that, Tai Yiu-ting and Au Nok-hin began to visit various districts to coordinate the primary election mechanism, which eventually took shape after a number of coordination meetings.
tgt: 2020年3月，各大政黨分別展開黨內程序，而各區有意參選人亦開始四出進行「摸底」探路 。呢個時候，戴耀廷同埋區諾軒一齊倡議包含「公民參與」嘅協調機制，以減少出選名單為目標，又指期望促成「棄選」共識，以攞到最多議席 。3月10日，戴耀廷喺《香港蘋果日報》撰文，提出兩階段協調同埋公民參與，最終目標係盡量減少參與官方選舉嘅名單數目，越接近該區嘅目標議席數目就越好 。之後，戴耀廷同埋區諾軒開始走訪各區，以協調初選機制 ，最終經過多個協調會後，初選機制逐漸成形 。

Few of Leung's early works are known, and even if they were published, they were not available in all major bookstores, and no one cared about them at the book signing sessions at the Hong Kong Book Fair. Later, he noticed the problem and began to seriously run his fan page, which attracted nearly 90,000 netizens in just two years. His 2016 serialized novel "I'm Gi'an, Today I'm at Nobita's Funeral" made him even more famous, with more than 150,000 likes and more than 30,000 shares in one day, and his 2018 work "Onomatopoeia of Death" also received about 1 million views after being serialized on the Internet for about 10 days.
tgt: 梁早期嘅作品無乜人知，就算出版書籍亦都未能喺各大書局全線上架，喺香港書展嘅簽書會亦都無人問津。後嚟佢留意到問題所在，就開始認真經營自己嘅粉絲專頁，喺短短兩年間就吸引到近9萬名網民支持。而喺2016年連載嘅小說《我是技安，今天我出席了大雄的葬禮》更加令佢出名，有關嘅帖喺一日內獲得超過15萬個Like，分享次數過3萬；2018年推出嘅作品《死亡的擬聲詞》喺網絡連載約十日後亦都獲得約一百萬嘅點擊次數。

src: That didn't say good
